title: MAP_VALUE_STARTS_WITH
description: Returns the corresponding return_value for the first compare_substring that matches the beginning of the provided string (case-sensitive). If no substrings match, returns default_return_value_optional. If default_return_value_optional is omitted and no matches occur, the function returns $SKIP_ASSIGNMENT.

parameters.name: … compare_substring
parameters.description: The substring to match at the beginning of the provided string.

parameters.name: … return_value
parameters.description: The value returned if compare_substring matches.

parameters.name: default_return_value_optional
parameters.description: The value returned if no substrings match. If omitted and no match occurs, returns $SKIP_ASSIGNMENT.

examples:
MAP_VALUE_STARTS_WITH(Description, "Platnium", "Partner", "Individual", "Person")
-- Returns "Partner" if Description starts with "Platinum".
-- Returns "Person" if it starts with "Individual".
-- Returns $SKIP_ASSIGNMENT otherwise.
-- Matching is case-sensitive and stops at the first match.

tips.text: Ensure that return_value and default_return_value_optional are of the same data type.
